name: Salt Cure
description: You salt cure the target, dealing damage over time. Choose a target in range. The target must make a DEX save against your Move DC. On failure, the target takes 1d4 + MOVE rock-type damage, and it takes 1d4 rock-type damage at the start of each of its turns until it is returned to a Pokéball or receives healing.
Water- and Steel-type Pokémon are vulnerable to the damage dealt by this move.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
